landingPage.resumeText: Fascinated by computer science and its security challenges, I am pursuing a career in cybersecurity. Creative and persistent, I enjoy tackling challenges as part of a team to address current issues in the field of computer security.

forensique.title: Reversing
forensique.contentText: I excel at breaking down software and systems to understand their workings, pinpoint vulnerabilities, and analyze malicious code, Disassembly , Debugging and Malware analysis.

devsecops.title: DevSecOps
devsecops.contentText: Deep understanding of software development, information security, and regulatory compliance. Proficient in network security, and penetration testing.

pentesting.title: Penetration Testing
pentesting.contentText: Common penetration testing and vulnerability assessment. Reconnaissance, exploitation, post-exploitation, and reporting. Identification and remediation of vulnerabilities to ensure system and network security.

developpement.title: Red Teaming
developpement.contentText: I excel at simulating attacks to assess system security. I identify vulnerabilities, execute realistic attack scenarios, and provide recommendations to bolster security. I have expertise in social engineering, phishing.

aboutMePage.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: Final year Student at ENIT, iI'm currently working at Pwn & Patch as a Cybersecurity Consultant.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: Experienced cybersecurity engineer, I am passionate about data protection and computer security. With industry experience, I specialize in implementing robust security systems for businesses of all sizes. I am also skilled in penetration testing, regulatory compliance, and security incident management. My goal is to provide advanced security solutions to help protect digital assets.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: As a self-hosting enthusiast, I firmly believe that everyone should have full control over their data and online services. That's why I specialize in hosting my own websites, applications, and services to avoid dependence on major online service providers. I enjoy sharing my knowledge and experiences with others to help them understand the benefits of self-hosting and get started on this journey. My goal is to make it easier for everyone to achieve digital self-sufficiency

id_3.title: Setting up Vulnerable Active Directory Lab for Penetration Testing Training
